Description: A bifacial flint knife: without handle, of a mottled cream and pale brown colour. The surfaces have been roughly flaked and the edge has been sharpened by chipping. One corner broken away.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. B. Emery, 'Great tombs of the First Dynasty; excavations at Sakkara' III (London, 1958), 51 and pl. 125 (2).
